heading: Qualifications
text:
All applicants for a private elevator inspection agency director license shall submit satisfactory proof
establishing that the applicant:
  1. Has at least ten years of practical experience in the supervision of the assembly, installation, maintenance, repair, design or
     inspection of elevators within the fifteen years prior to application; or
  2. Is an engineer or architect and has at least five years experience in the supervision of the assembly, installation, maintenance,
     repair, design or inspection of elevators within the seven years prior to application.
